channel.title: Making my server public
channel.description: I am asking this Ub3r n00b question cuz im having troubles with getting my server publi will someoe please post a repl that helps me im making a non hamachi private server I have set up portforwarding made a no-ip and dled utorrent and still no1 can log on i als have my environmental variables set up wat did i miss :[]?

item.description:
@Micker wrote:

[quote=“durfx, post:11, topic:294492”]yes i do but i cant get it to work for me because of my router and im unwilling to do it for other people (besides it isnt hard, like i said its probably your modem), teamviewer is a pain and im about to watch some dr who or torchwood im not sure. =]

off topic: dr who is wayyyyy better than torchwood[/quote]

Lol off topic but, Dpctor Who ftw! The accent they have is british right? The last episode is so kewl xD.

item.title: Making my server public
item.dc:creator: @durfx durfx
item.description:
@durfx wrote:

well you have 3 choices:

  1. have someone teamveiwer you because you didnt portforward correctly.

  2. have a parent or gaurdian call your internet service provider and find out if it is your modem and perhaps have them help you out.

  3. give up.

Read full topic

item.title: Making my server public
item.dc:creator: @durfx durfx
item.description:
@durfx wrote:

uhm perhaps it has to do with your modem, some modems (like mine) have a built in router which doesnt directly connect you to the internet but goes through different ip’s this makes portforwarding nearly impossible unless switching your modem into a bridge mode which i seem to not know how to do which leaves people like me stuck and unable to portforward… id say call your isp and try to sort things out alot of isp’s help with this sort of stuff

Read full topic
